Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • Game
  • public class Game
extends greenfoot.World
    Tank Battle is a two-players game. Touch coin and shoot down the opponent's tank can both score. Score 21 points first will be the final winner. SO, GAME ON! Game world is basically setting up all the actor classes I have created. It inclueds the most methods such as initializes each Actor class, sets their coordinates, and increase the score system.
    Version:
    2020.11.23
    Author:
    Steven Zhu
